DOC.brief_summary: To salvage the luteal phase and improve pregnancy rate in antagonist IVF/ICSI cycles triggered with GnRH agonist. Two strategies are compared supplementing the luteal phase with three small doses (500 IU) of HCG and giving a booster dose of HCG (1500 IU) on the day of ovum pickup.
DOC.brief_title: Three Small Doses of HCG Versus Booster Dose of HCG on Ovum Pickup Day
DOC.criteria: High responder females undergoing antagonist protocol IVF/ICSI cycle More than 14 MII oocytes Estradiol more than 3500 pg/ml on day of trigger Any other protocol Normal or poor responders
